column1: '''Naimi''', also called '''Éadgifu''' in [[Old English]], was an [[Elf]] of [[Tol Eressëa]]. She was a niece of [[Vairë (wife of Lindo)
column2: Vairë]], the wife of [[Lindo]]. She was also the wife of [[Eriol]] and the mother to [[Heorrenda]].<ref>{{LT2

column1: <div style="overflow-x: scroll; overflow-y: hidden; border: 1px solid #AAAAAA; padding: 3px; background: #EEEEEE;">
In another version a woman named '''Éadgifu''' was the wife of a man named [[Déor (father of Ælfwine)
[[Category:Characters in The Book of Lost Tales]]
